author: Benjamin Nykiel
comment: I like that it runs entirely in the background with no ongoing notifications. Would be nice if you added the feature to start the watch's recording from the phone. Also I think maybe changing the name from "NightMic for Wear" to "Night Mic for Wear" with the space might improve store search results.  Keep up the good work!
title: Cool app

author: Phil Reisman
comment: Good for recording karaoke on late nights.
title: Works Great
